name: Cyber Truck: Save the Globe
description:
Cyber Truck: Save The Globe 🌎🌍🌏 has you rescuing Penguins stranded in the melting arctic & smashing greedy Oil Rigs, all in the name of saving our planet!

Drive ENDLESSLY through the ❄️🔥 MELTING ARCTIC ICE CAPS.  🐧 Penguins will hop in your CYBER TRUNK as you pass by. Bring those little guys to the drop off zone for major BONUS POINTS! Gather MASSIVE SPEED as you progress through the arctic landscape! 

🏆🥇🥈🥉Chart the top of the GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS and take your place as the #1 Globe Saver!

Populate your  ❄️ PENGUIN ISLAND  ❄️ and build a penguin community! Customize penguins with unique names and unlockable hats! Give your penguins lots of love for huge coin rewards and also because they're just so cute!

We sincerely hope you enjoy our game! If you have any feedback, please submit a review or contact us directly through our website or on Instagram @9centgames!
